name: Orpheus (lucvar)
description:
In 2072, the world was sent into chaos.

Mass-produced military machines created by the LOCAL 99 corporation broke containment and unleashed their power on the planet.

The world has not yet recovered from his incident.

LOCAL 99 has never publicly made a statement on the matter.

LOCAL 99 has never been seen again.

LOCAL 99 has left us to die.

Find out what happened.

Tell us what they didn't.

--CONTROLS--

-Use your mouse to move between rooms

-That's it...

**Note: The game may be a bit buggy,  I'm very new to unity.
